item.title: Research | Bypass CSRF Protection w/ XSS
item.description: Contents About XSS What can we do w/ XSS? Prevention About CSRF Scenario Using XSS for bypassing CSRF protection Another Bypass Technique Exploiting About XSS In Breif: Web Application receives data from client from GET function, then displays it. if(isset($_GET['text'])) { $var = $_GET['text']; print $var; } // This code checks if the 'text' variable is set for the GET request. // The code stores its contents in a variable called "$var", And prints its contents.
